err.msg: Behavior out format %s is not a legal format!\nA Verilog file will be dumped.\n
err.doc: To describe the format for the generated behavior, you must set 'avtOutputBehaviorFormat' either to 'vhd' for VHDL or to 'vlg' for Verilog.\n

err.msg: Behavior in format %s is not a legal format!\n
err.doc: To describe the format of input behavior, you must set 'avtInputBehaviorFormat' either to 'vhd' for VHDL or to 'vlg' for Verilog.\n
